text:
```$ whoami
vagrant
$ stat .env.development
  File: `.env.development'
  Size: 802             Blocks: 8          IO Block: 4096   regular file
Device: fd00h/64768d    Inode: 269257      Links: 1
Access: (0644/-rw-r--r--)  Uid: (  500/ vagrant)   Gid: (  500/ vagrant)
Access: 2020-03-17 20:32:47.937672545 +0900
Modify: 2020-03-11 15:52:22.387309138 +0900
Change: 2020-03-17 20:32:23.359904489 +0900
$ rm .env.development
rm: cannot remove `.env.development': Permission denied```
権限はあるのに、ファイルが消せない場合の知見をどなたかお持ちではないですか？

elements.text:
$ whoami
vagrant
$ stat .env.development
  File: `.env.development'
  Size: 802             Blocks: 8          IO Block: 4096   regular file
Device: fd00h/64768d    Inode: 269257      Links: 1
Access: (0644/-rw-r--r--)  Uid: (  500/ vagrant)   Gid: (  500/ vagrant)
Access: 2020-03-17 20:32:47.937672545 +0900
Modify: 2020-03-11 15:52:22.387309138 +0900
Change: 2020-03-17 20:32:23.359904489 +0900
$ rm .env.development
rm: cannot remove `.env.development': Permission denied
権限はあるのに、ファイルが消せない場合の知見をどなたかお持ちではないですか？
